name: chandelier
summary: A brass chandelier with real candles.
description: This is a dinner table in the center of the dining room.

facts.description: The brass is covered in soot.
None of the candles are burning.
Wax has collected on the candle holders.

interactions.description: The player tries to swing the chandelier
interactions.effect: It swings and a candle drops on his head.

interactions.description: He tries to remove it from the ceiling.
